document.full_text: israel kept a commercial crossing with hamas-ruled gaza shut for a seventh day tuesday although a truce had stopped cross-border fighting, and a un official said he was "extremely worried" essential supplies may run out.
document.title: israel keeps gaza goods crossing shut despite truce
lines_and_colors: israel kept a commercial crossing with hamas-ruled gaza shut for a seventh day tuesday although a truce had stopped cross-border fighting, and a un official said he was "extremely worried" essential supplies may run out.
